descriptions.long:
Simple Facebook Customizer is an extension for Chromium-based browsers (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Brave and more). It's main purpose is to change default Facebook look with any combination of the predefined settings.

Hiding various bars, notifications, messages and more! Remove elements that bother you or you simply don't like the look of them.

Need was the mother of this extension - installing an extension and simply checking wanted toggles is way easier than editing browser custom CSS's every time you want to make persistent stylesheet for a website - in this case Facebook.

descriptions.short: Visualization of all the characters and its data.
descriptions.long: Rick & Morty Database is a simple application to browse and save your favorite characters from previously mentioned series. It saves your favorite characters locally, and fetches data from an external API. Browsing characters was never as smooth of an expierience thanks to implemented pagination. Initial idea for this project came from a recruitment task for a developer job that i've applied to.

descriptions.short: Webservice with a public API and a search engine.
descriptions.long: Yerba Mate Home is a simple informational site about Mate. It has public API for use to anyone, as well as visual representation of it in user friendly GUI. There is also a basic search engine implemented to easily search thru visualized API data. Focused on being open-source and nice to use, so everyone can contribute to the project or at least use it.

descriptions.short: An application to visualize operations on arrays.
descriptions.long: Array Visualizer is a simple web application for visualizing operations on arrays. Sometimes it might be hard to imagine how Intersection or Symmetric Difference between arrays will behave - with this tool it will be no longer an issue, you will get your result in a single visually represented array. Exported version of it should match results in most of the programming languages.
